en: I bought an old lamp.
I bid ten dollars for the old stove.
zh: 我出十块钱买那个旧炉子。

en: I, for one, don't like pictures like this.
zh: 我个人是不喜欢这种画的。

en: I refused it for private reasons.
zh: 我因为私人原因拒绝了。

en: I, for one, am for the plan.
zh: 反正我是支持这个计划的。

en: I chose a word carefully.
I didn't know how to express myself.
I can convey my feelings in words.
zh: 我可以用言语表达我的感受。

en: I only did as I was told.
Modern art has no interest for me.
I'm not interested in modern art.
zh: 我对现代艺术不感兴趣。

en: Modern art doesn't interest me.
I really can't understand modern sculpture.
zh: 我真的看不懂现代雕塑。

en: I went to the theater to see a modern drama.
zh: 我去剧院看了一场现代剧。

en: I must admit I don't like much contemporary music.
zh: 我得承认，我不怎么喜欢现代音乐。

en: I am content with my current position.
zh: 我对目前的职位挺满意的。

en: I must be content with my present salary.
zh: 我必须满足于现在的薪水。

en: I don't have any cash about me.
I don't have any cash on me.
I heard the front doorbell ring.
I went up to the front door.
I'm trying to lose weight.
I'm very much in favor of cutting taxes.
I was brought up under rigid discipline.
I am getting on well.
I forgot the key and went back for it.
zh: 我忘了带钥匙，回去拿了。

en: I broke down the door because I lost the key.
zh: 因为钥匙丢了，我把门撞开了。

en: I asked for the key and went upstairs to my room.
zh: 我要了钥匙，然后上楼回房了。

en: I have lost the key.
I've lost my key.
It seems that I have lost my keys.
It seems that I've lost my keys.
I have lost my key.
I've come to see the sights.
I saw a stranger steal into his house.
zh: 我看到一个陌生人溜进了他家。

en: I saw a stranger enter that house.
zh: 我看到一个陌生人进了那间房子。

en: I looked around, but saw nobody.
zh: 我环顾四周，但没看到人。

en: When he saw me, he pretended to be asleep.
zh: 他一看到我，就假装睡着了。

en: I bought every book on Japan I could find.
zh: 我买了所有能找到的关于日本的书。

en: I got hurt in the shoulder.
I felt myself touched on the shoulder.
zh: 我感觉有人拍了下我的肩膀。

en: I have a stiff shoulder.
I concentrated my effort on the study.
I went about with my dog.
I tied my dog to the tree in the yard.
zh: 我把狗拴在院子里的树上了。

en: I made my dog lie down.
I have a dog.
I saw a dog. The dog held a piece of meat in its mouth.
zh: 我看到一只狗，嘴里叼着一块肉。

en: I keep a dog.
I have a dog and two cats.
zh: 我养了一只狗和两只猫。

en: I prefer cats to dogs.
I don't like dogs.
I like dogs better than cats, because the former are more faithful than the latter.
zh: 我更喜欢狗而不是猫，因为狗比猫更忠诚。

en: I like a dog better than a cat, for the former is more faithful than the latter.
zh: 比起猫我更喜欢狗，因为狗比猫更忠心。

en: I fed some meat to my dog.
I feed meat to my dog.
I gave the dog a bone, stopping its barking.
zh: 我给了那只狗一根骨头，它就不叫了。

en: I gave the dog a bone. That stopped its barking.
zh: 我给那只狗扔了根骨头，它这下不吵了。

en: I saw a dog swim across the river.
zh: 我看见一只狗游过了河。

en: I like dogs, but my sister likes cats.
zh: 我喜欢狗，但我姐姐喜欢猫。

en: I am afraid of dogs.
I'm afraid of dogs.
I'm scared of dogs.
I went to the hospital to have my eyes tested.
zh: 我去医院检查了一下视力。

en: He had a gun on his person.
I tried to stop their quarrel eagerly.
I tried my best to get them to stop quarreling.
zh: 我尽力去劝他们别再吵了。

en: I tried very hard to put an end to their heated argument.
zh: 我费了好大劲才让他们别再吵下去。

en: I prepared for the game by training hard.
zh: 为了准备比赛，我一直在拼命训练。

en: I call architecture frozen music.
zh: 我把建筑称作凝固的音乐。

en: I want to put an end to the quarrel.
I go to the same school as Kenji.
zh: 我和健二在同一个学校。

en: I had a physical checkup.
I take my health seriously.
I gave up smoking for health.
I stopped smoking for the sake of my health.
zh: 为了身体好，我把烟戒了。

en: I want to live as long as I can stay in good health.
zh: 只要身体还健康，我就想一直活下去。

en: I am blessed with good health.
I asked Ken to help me.
I exercise because I want to stay healthy.
zh: 我锻炼是为了保持健康。

en: I invited Ken, Bill and Yumi.
zh: 我邀请了肯、比尔和由美。

en: I lent the record to Ken.
I want to travel to the moon.
I expect that I will see him on Monday.
zh: 我觉得我周一能见到他。

en: I plan to see him on Monday.
I study English on Monday and Friday.
I am given a monthly allowance of fifty thousand yen.
zh: 我每个月有五万日元的零用钱。

en: I never fail to write to my mother once a month.
zh: 我每个月雷打不动地给我妈写封信。

en: I go to Hiroshima three times a month.
I go to the barber's once a month.
I go to the movies once a month.
I tried to imagine life on the moon.
zh: 我试着想象了一下在月球上的生活。

en: I rent a room by the month.
I consulted with my sister about my marriage.
zh: 我和我姐商量了一下我的婚事。

en: I'm married.
After I got married, my Japanese got better and I could understand more.
zh: 结婚以后，我的日语变好了，能听懂的也多了。

en: That's fine with me.
I can hold my liquor.
I failed after all.
I trust that, in the long run, I will not be a loser.
zh: 我相信从长远来看，我不会是个输家。

en: I can't tie a very good knot.
I took a picture at the decisive moment.
zh: 我在关键时刻拍下了那张照片。

en: I'm very slow at making up my mind.
I was too embarrassed to look her in the eye.
zh: 我不好意思看她的眼睛。

en: Never did I tell her that I loved her.
zh: 我从来没告诉过她我爱她。

en: I don't dislike him at all.
I never eat meat.
I'm anything but bright.
I am by no means absent from this class because I am lazy.
zh: 我这节课没来绝不是因为我懒。

en: I never get seasick because I am used to traveling by boat.
zh: 我从来不晕船，因为我习惯坐船了。

en: I'll never lose hope.
I adhered to my decision.
I make it a rule never to eat between meals.
zh: 我有个习惯，正餐之间从不吃零食。

en: I'll never do anything by halves.
I am anything but a liar.
I am far from satisfied with the result.
zh: 我对这个结果一点儿也不满意。

en: I never try to go to there.
I never say what is not true.
I'll never let you down.
I am far from blaming you.
I'll never forget your kindness.
zh: 我永远忘不了你的恩情。

en: I never give up.
I would have been shot.
I met with my teacher in the theater.
zh: 我在剧院碰到了我的老师。

en: I like to see comedy in the theater.
I sat behind a very tall man in the theater.
zh: 我在剧院里坐在一个高个子男人的后面。

en: I sat behind a very tall person at the theater.
zh: 我在剧院里坐在一个很高的人后面。

en: I work in the field of art.
I felt a light touch on my shoulder.
zh: 我感觉到有人轻轻拍了下我的肩膀。

en: I ate a light lunch.
I like light shoes.
I was hit by the policeman.
I tried to get in touch with the police.
I asked a policeman for directions.
I told the policeman what I knew.
zh: 我把我知道的都告诉警察了。

en: I didn't just make the plan, I carried it out.
zh: 我不只是制定了计划，还把它落实了。

en: I had to change my plans.
zh: 我不得不改变我的计划。

en: I had to change the plan.
I am in financial difficulties.
I am economically independent of my parents.
zh: 我经济上已经独立，不靠父母了。

en: I saw Keiko playing tennis after school.
zh: 我看到惠子放学后在打网球。

en: I cannot but give up my brother for lost.
zh: 我只能认定我哥哥回不来了。

en: I've given up my brother for dead.
zh: 我已经认定我哥哥不在人世了。

en: I carefully explored the contract.
zh: 我仔细研究了合同内容。

en: I am not so diligent as my brother.
I went to the station to see my brother off.
I'm proud of my brother.
I lent my coat to a friend of my brother.
zh: 我把外套借给我哥的一个朋友了。

en: I came to Tokyo from Osaka counting on my brother's help.
zh: 我从大阪来东京就是指望着我哥能帮我。

en: I had my brother repair my bicycle.
zh: 我让我哥帮我修了自行车。

en: I went to the movies with my brother.
zh: 我和我哥去看了场电影。

en: I went to the cinema with my brother.
zh: 我和我哥去了趟电影院。

en: I played tennis with my brother.
I have one brother.
I have one elder brother and a younger sister.
zh: 我有一个哥哥和一个妹妹。

en: I have one older brother and one younger sister.
zh: 我有一个哥哥和一个妹妹。

en: I have an older brother and a younger sister.
zh: 我有一个哥哥和一个妹妹。

en: I have confidence in you.
I'll do whatever I can to help you.
I can't help you. Do your assignment yourself.
zh: 我帮不了你，你自己写作业吧。

en: I'll stand up for you.
I'd better drive you home.
zh: 还是我开车送你回家吧。

en: It's better if I drove you all the way home.
zh: 最好还是由我开车把你直接送到家。

en: I'll never fail you.
I want to make you work harder.
I didn't want to bring you in.
zh: 我本来不想把你卷进来的。

en: I'm taller than you.
I don't want to have you involved in the trouble.
zh: 我不想让你卷进麻烦里。

en: I'm much younger than you.
I have ten more pens than you.
I am not as interested in literature as you.
zh: 我对文学没你那么感兴趣。

en: I'm not as interested in literature as you.
zh: 我对文学没你那么感兴趣。

en: I'm not as interested in literature as you are.
zh: 我对文学没你那么感兴趣。

en: I'm looking forward to seeing you and your family.
zh: 挺期待见到你和你的家人的。

en: I am not more careful than you are.
I cannot follow your theory.
I cannot follow your logic.
I am tempted to doubt your friendship.
zh: 我有点怀疑咱们的友谊了。

en: I am fully convinced of your innocence.
zh: 我完全相信你是清白的。

en: I defer to your judgement.
I agree to your proposal.
I have the same dictionary as your brother has.
zh: 我有一本和你哥一样的词典。

en: I may write a letter for you.
I can assure you of your success.
I can't be unconcerned about your future.
zh: 我没法不关心你的未来。

en: I like your car.
I love your car.
I don't quite know how it happened.
zh: 我也不太清楚是怎么回事。

en: I'm thinking about you.
I'm very impressed by your work.
zh: 你的工作表现让我印象很深。

en: I shall want an explanation of your behavior.
zh: 你得解释一下你的行为。

en: I took your word for it.
I know the person you are talking about.
I'm not so simple as to believe you.
I am all ears to what you say.
I worry about your health.
I don't object to your plan.
I can't follow the course of your argument.
zh: 我跟不上你的辩论思路。

en: I am assured of your help.
I am pleased with your present.
I couldn't but be irritated with you.
I like you very much.
I met your girlfriend.
I know your father.
I know your father very well.
I don't need any bit of your charity.
zh: 我一点儿也不需要你的施舍。

en: I know your brother very well.
I know your older brother quite well.
I told him what I had told you.
zh: 我把跟你说的话也跟他说了。

en: I always had my eye on you.
I want you to see her.
I can't let you talk about your own father that way.
zh: 我不能让你那样说你爸爸。

en: I advise you to be punctual.
I recommend that you should buy a learner's dictionary.
zh: 我建议你买本学习词典。

en: I am counting on you to give the opening address.
zh: 我就指望你来做开幕致辞了。

en: I want to see you.
I owe everything to you.
I don't like your going there by yourself.
zh: 我不喜欢你一个人去那儿。

en: I mean you no harm.
I will give you a notebook.
I can't let you do that.
I may have told you such a thing, but I don't remember it at all.
zh: 我可能跟你说过这事，但我完全不记得了。

en: I'd like you to go there.
I want you to come at once.
I may have told you this story before.
zh: 我以前可能给你讲过这个故事。

en: I may have discussed this with you before.
zh: 我以前可能跟你讨论过这件事。

en: I want you to read this letter.
I want you to read this English letter.
zh: 我想让你读读这封英文信。

en: I want you to stay here longer.
zh: 我想让你在这儿多待一会儿。

en: How much do I owe you?
I want you to play the guitar for me.
zh: 我想让你给我弹弹吉他。

en: I don't mind lending some money to you.
I want to ask a favor of you.
I owe you 3,000 yen.
I came to the same decision as you.
I'd love to come with you.
I do not agree with you at all.
I'm looking forward to seeing you again.
I was surprised at you and your brother appearing on TV.
zh: 看到你和你哥哥上电视，我挺意外的。

en: I expect you all to do your best.
zh: 我希望你们大家都能尽力而为。

en: I didn't blame you for hitting him.
zh: 我并没有因为你打他而怪你。

en: I think it necessary for you to see him.
zh: 我觉得你有必要见见他。

en: I think it's necessary for you to see him.
zh: 我觉得你有必要去见他一面。

en: I think you need to see him.
I want the same style of jacket as yours.
zh: 我想要件和你一样的夹克。

en: I believe you are honest.
I am not wholly convinced that you are right.
zh: 我并不完全相信你是对的。

en: I am very glad to hear of your success.
zh: 听说你成功了，我真为你高兴。

en: I'll never forget what you told me.
zh: 我永远不会忘记你对我说过的话。

en: I heard you talking in your sleep last night.
zh: 我昨晚听见你说梦话了。

en: I want the same dictionary as you have.
zh: 我想要一本和你一样的词典。

en: I don't have as much money as you think I do.
zh: 我没你想象的那么有钱。

en: I regret saying that you were wrong.
I can't do such a thing like you did.
zh: 我做不出像你那样的这种事。

en: I am not pleased with what you have done.
zh: 我对你做的事情不太满意。

en: I don't know where you're from, and neither does he.
zh: 我不知道你是哪儿人，他也不知道。

en: I think it necessary that you should do so.
zh: 我觉得你有必要这样做。

en: I don't like your coming late every time.
zh: 我不喜欢你每次都迟到。

en: I think you made up that story about the accident.
zh: 我觉得关于事故的那个故事是你编的。

en: I am afraid of bears.
I had my shoes cleaned.
I had my shoes shined.
I must buy a pair of shoes.
I've worn out my shoes.
I got my shoes wet.
I had my shoes mended at that store.
I loosened my shoelaces.
I met her at the station by accident.
zh: 我在车站碰巧遇到了她。

en: I came upon an old friend of mine on the train.
zh: 我在火车上偶遇了一个老朋友。

en: It chanced that I met him at the airport.
zh: 我碰巧在机场遇到了他。

en: I met her by accident at the bus stop.
zh: 我在公交站碰巧遇到了她。

en: I met an old friend by chance in Kyoto.
zh: 我在京都偶遇了一个老朋友。

en: I came to Liverpool by chance.
I chanced to be working there.
zh: 我当时刚好在那儿工作。

en: I found the book by chance.
I met Jane by accident.
I am a hungry spider.
zh: 我是一只饿坏了的蜘蛛。

en: I was too hungry to speak.
I felt faint with hunger.
I waste a lot of time daydreaming.
zh: 我大把的时间都花在胡思乱想上了。

en: I went to the airport to see my mother off.
I have a picture of an airport.
I indulged in some duty-free shopping at the airport.
zh: 我在机场的免税店逛了逛。

en: I met a friend of mine at the airport.
zh: 我在机场碰到了一个朋友。

en: I chanced to meet him at the airport.
zh: 我刚好在机场遇到了他。

en: I went into the air force.
I can no more swim than I can fly.
zh: 我既不会游泳，也不会飞。

en: I saw a strange moving object in the sky.
zh: 我看到天空中有一个奇怪的移动物体。

en: I was foolish enough to leave my commutation ticket at home.
zh: 我真够笨的，把月票落在家里了。

en: I was foolish enough to believe it.
I have no faith in a silly superstition.
zh: 我一点都不信什么迷信。

en: I complained, but they refused to take this sweater back.
zh: 我投诉了，但他们不肯退这件毛衣。

en: I worked my way through college.
zh: 我是靠勤工俭学读完大学的。

en: I have a fancy for bitter things.
I have never been to Kyushu.
I'm from Fukuoka in Kyushu.
I will finish my homework by nine.
I went to the bank to withdraw $20,000 from deposit.
zh: 我去银行取了两万块钱存款。

en: I'm going to the bank.
I have to go to the bank.
I've got to go to the bank.
I opened my account with the bank.
zh: 我在这家银行开了个户。

en: I work for a bank.
I worked for a bank.
I exchanged some yen for dollars at the bank.
zh: 我在银行把一些日元换成了美金。

en: I have several silver coins.
I collect silver tea spoons.
I went there for the express purpose of earning money.
zh: 我去那儿就是为了赚钱。

en: I'm not rich, nor do I wish to be.
zh: 我不富有，也不想变富有。

en: I am not rich, nor do I wish to be.
zh: 我并不富有，也不想变富有。

en: I was a rich man.
I'm not rich but have so much to offer.
zh: 我虽不富有，但我能给的有很多。

en: I put the money in a three-year time deposit at the bank.
zh: 我把钱在银行存了个三年定期。

en: I would choose honor before money.
zh: 相比金钱，我更看重名誉。

en: I have neither money nor friends.
I don't have any money and I don't have any friends either.
Though I have neither money nor friends, I am not so unhappy as you think.
zh: 虽然我没钱也没朋友，但我并没有你想得那么不开心。

en: I need money badly.
I don't like the idea that money is everything.
zh: 我不喜欢那种“金钱就是一切”的想法。

en: I will call on him one of these days.
I'm on good terms with the neighbors.
I had an interesting conversation with my neighbor.
I am near-sighted, so I cannot make out what is written on that signboard.
zh: 我有点近视，看不清那块招牌上写的什么。

en: I am going to visit the art exhibition one of these days.
zh: 过几天我打算去看看那个画展。

en: I swore off drinking only to start again the next week.
zh: 我发誓戒酒，结果下礼拜又喝上了。

en: I'm giving up smoking.
I don't like the taste of onions.
I hold a belief in the importance of hard work.
zh: 我坚信努力是很重要的。

en: I tried to learn the melody by heart.
zh: 我试着把这段旋律背下来。

en: I jumped up in surprise.
I was surprised and became sad.
I'm staring at myself in a mirror.
zh: 我正盯着镜子里的自己看。

en: I blew my breath against the mirror.
zh: 我对着镜子哈了一口气。

en: I held my breath in excitement.
My name is Hashimoto.
I was told the news by Hashimoto.
zh: 我是听桥本说的这个消息。

en: I got that news from Hashimoto.
zh: 我从桥本那儿得到了那个消息。

en: I parted from him on the bridge.
I have an appointment with the professor at 1:30.
zh: 我和教授约在一点半见面。

en: I am a professor.
I'm a professor, or rather an associate professor, to be exact.
zh: 我是教授，更确切点说，是副教授。

en: I was alone in the classroom.
I couldn't make myself heard in the classroom.
zh: 教室里吵得大家都听不见我说话。

en: I started to learn English with the aim of becoming a teacher.
zh: 我为了当老师开始学习英语。

en: I intended to have become a teacher.
Now that I am a teacher, I think otherwise.
zh: 既然现在我是老师了，想法就不一样了。

en: I am a writer rather than a teacher.
zh: 与其说我是老师，不如说我是个作家。

en: "I am a teacher." "So am I."
I met her at the church.
I saw a woman at the church, whose beauty made a lasting impression on me.
zh: 我在教堂看见一个女人，她的美让我印象深刻。

en: I forgot to buy the textbook.
I regret becoming a teacher.
The necessity of education came home to me.
zh: 我深刻体会到了教育的必要性。

en: It was brought home to me how important education is.
zh: 我总算体会到了教育有多重要。

en: I teach.
The evolution of dinosaurs interests me greatly.
zh: 我对恐龙的进化特别感兴趣。

en: I have a great interest in the evolution of dinosaurs.
zh: 我对恐龙的进化过程有很大的兴趣。

en: I was trembling with fear.
I could not say a word for fear.
zh: 我吓得一句话也说不出来。

en: I almost went crazy with fear.
I had a terrible dream.
I met with an awful accident.
I have pretty much forgotten the emphatic constructions.
zh: 强调句的结构我差不多都忘光了。

en: I firmly believe.
I had my umbrella blown off by the strong wind.
I am impatient with those who aren't cooperative.
zh: 我对那些不配合的人没耐心。

en: I graduated from Kyoto University.
I graduated from the University of Kyoto.
I will visit Kyoto.
I never go to Kyoto without visiting the Nanzenji Temple.
zh: 我每次去京都必去南禅寺。

en: I have once been to Kyoto.
I have been to Kyoto one time.
I'm going to stay with my uncle in Kyoto.
zh: 我要去京都住在叔叔家。

en: I am deeply attached to old temples in Kyoto.
zh: 我对京都的古庙很有感情。

en: I am going to stay with my aunt in Kyoto.
zh: 我要去京都住在阿姨家。

en: I had no sooner arrived in Kyoto than I fell ill.
I have a friend who lives in Kyoto.
I went to Kyoto, where I happened to see her.
zh: 我去了京都，在那儿碰巧见到了她。

en: I want to go to Tokyo.
I have been to Kyoto.
I am planning to visit Kyoto, and Nara as well.
zh: 我打算去京都，还有奈良。

en: I was born in Kyoto.
I want to live in Kyoto or in Nara.
zh: 我想住在京都或者奈良。

en: I like meat better than fish.
I'd prefer meat to fish.
I prefer meat to fish any day.
zh: 无论什么时候，我都更喜欢吃肉。

en: I like fish.
I noticed that I had slept past my station.
I got acquainted with him last year.
I came to Japan last year.
I was in the third year of middle school last year.
I was in the ninth grade last year.
I underwent major surgery last year.
I graduated from university last year.
I lived in Sanda City last year.
I did not live in Sanda last year.
I graduated from high school last year.
I didn't see a doctor last year.
I went to America last fall.
I remember last summer's adventure.
zh: 我还记得去年夏天的冒险经历。

en: I took a trip across Canada last April.
zh: 去年四月我横穿加拿大旅游了一圈。

en: I lived in New York last year.
I have lived in Kobe since last year.
zh: 我从去年起就一直住在神户。

en: I have not lived in Sanda since last year.
zh: 我从去年开始就没在三田住了。

en: I heard about it from another source last year.
zh: 去年我从别的地方听说了这事。

en: I want to drink milk.
I like to drink milk.
I must buy some milk.
I prefer mutton to beef.
zh: 比起牛肉，我更喜欢吃羊肉。

en: I met an old friend, and what was more strange, my former teacher.
zh: 我遇到了个老朋友，更巧的是，还遇到了我以前的老师。

en: I ran into an old friend of mine.
One-fifth of my wages go to taxes.
zh: 我工资的五分之一都交税了。

en: I work hard to catch up with the class.
zh: 为了跟上班里的进度，我学得很努力。

en: I proposed the plan to my classmates, some of whom were against it.
zh: 我跟同学提了那个计划，有些人不太赞成。

en: I met my classmate.
I was almost in tears.
I felt like crying.
I couldn't help but cry.
I must be away on urgent business.
zh: 我有急事，得离开一会儿。

en: I felt a sudden pain in my side.
I had to make a speech at short notice.
zh: 我被临时通知去做个演讲。

en: I had to make a speech on short notice.
zh: 我被临时拉去做个发言。

en: Must I hurry?
I put on my clothes in a hurry.
I got dressed in a hurry.
I had a hasty breakfast and left home.
zh: 我胡乱吃了几口早饭就出门了。

en: I finished my lunch quickly.
I ate a hasty lunch.
I quickly ate lunch.
I ate lunch in a hurry.
zh: 我匆匆忙忙地吃了午饭。

en: I hurried my clothes on.
I calculated hastily.
I'm not in a hurry.
As I was in a hurry, I had to take a taxi.
zh: 因为赶时间，我只好打了个车。

en: I think twice before I smoke.
zh: 我抽烟前都会仔细考虑一下。

en: I used to fish for hours on holidays.
zh: 以前放假时，我经常一钓鱼就是好几个小时。

en: I didn't go anywhere during the holiday.
I availed myself of a holiday to visit Tokyo.
zh: 我趁着假期去了一趟东京。

en: I cannot afford a holiday.
I can't afford a holiday.
I spent my vacation in Hakone.
Taking advantage of the holidays, I returned home to Nagoya.
zh: 我趁假期回了趟名古屋的老家。

en: I spent the major part of my vacation at my uncle's.
zh: 我假期的多半时间都在我叔叔家。

en: I laid out a schedule for the vacation.
I saw the sights of Kyoto during my vacation.
I was out of town on vacation.
I was abroad on vacation.
I went to Hawaii on vacation for a couple of weeks.
zh: 我去夏威夷度了两周假。

en: I lay down to rest.
I visited the town for the first time in a long time.
zh: 我隔了好久才又来到这个镇上。

en: I was out of breath from walking up and down hills.
I hold the converse opinion.
I bade farewell to the guests.
I went into a tearoom, where I happened to see him.
zh: 我进了一家茶馆，正巧在那儿遇见了他。

en: I had a cup of coffee at the coffee shop.
zh: 我在咖啡店喝了杯咖啡。

en: I don't care for smoking; it's bad for the health.
zh: 我不喜欢抽烟，对身体不好。

en: I am not as busy as Yoshio.
I have been nominated for the chairman.
I was appointed chairperson.
I am in duty bound to see this thing through.
zh: 我有责任把这件事管到底。

en: I tried to fulfill my duty.
zh: 我尽力履行了自己的职责。

en: I cannot forbear expressing my doubts.
zh: 我忍不住想表达我的疑问。

en: I have a suspicious nature.
I am going to be an engineer.
I want to be an engineer.
I can't agree to your proposal.
I recommend you to go by train.
I got a quick glimpse of Takanohana as he hurriedly left the gymnasium.
zh: 贵乃花急匆匆离开体育馆的时候，我瞥了他一眼。

en: I noticed your Model 123 in the January 1997 issue of Techno-World Magazine.
zh: 我在1997年1月号的《技术世界》杂志上注意到了你们的123型。

en: I am running short of memory.
I was guilty of a slip of memory.
I lead a regular life.
zh: 我的生活作息很有规律。

en: I have an orderly lifestyle.
I like spring the best of the seasons.
I am very fond of travelling by train.
zh: 我特别喜欢坐火车旅行。

en: I like traveling by train.
I was deeply discouraged.
I was discouraged.
I suggested that we should listen to music for a change.
zh: 我建议听点音乐换换心情。

en: I was too sick to stand.
I can't hide my feelings.
I'll put off my visit to England till the weather is warmer.
zh: 我打算等天暖和点儿再去英国。

en: I was feverish with embarrassment.
I passed behind him without being noticed.
zh: 我从他身后走过去，没被他发现。

en: I had my purse stolen somewhere on my way home.
zh: 我回家的路上钱包被偷了。

en: I'm going to drop in at his house on my way home.
zh: 我回家路上顺便去他家坐会儿。

en: I got leave to go home.
I slept soon when I came home.
I went to sleep as soon as I got home.
I always brush my coat when I come home.
zh: 我回家总是会刷刷我的外套。

en: May I go home?
I have to go home.
I must go home.
I've been very busy since I returned from abroad.
zh: 从国外回来后我就一直特别忙。

en: I met with a traffic accident on my way back.
zh: 我回来的路上出了车祸。

en: I'm not going back.
I took the opportunity to visit Rome.
I go to the museum whenever I get the chance.
zh: 我一有机会就去博物馆。

en: I should have studied harder before the term exams.
zh: 期末考试前我要是再努力点学就好了。

en: I unfolded the map on the desk.
zh: 我在桌子上摊开了地图。

en: I spread the big map on the table.
zh: 我把那张大地图铺在桌子上了。

en: I'm feeling kind of tired.
I felt rather puzzled.
I found a strange object lying on the road.
zh: 我发现路上有个奇怪的东西。

en: I heard a funny noise.
zh: 我听到一个奇怪的声音。

en: As I was frightened by the strange sound, I jumped up.
zh: 我被那个奇怪的声音吓了一跳，跳了起来。

en: I like a basic breakfast - miso soup and rice.
zh: 我喜欢简单的早餐——味噌汤和米饭。

en: I answered with joy.
I am willing to help you with your work.
I am willing to attend the meeting.
I am happy to help you.
I am ready to help you.
I'd be happy to help you.
I'd be most happy to assist you.
I am ready to follow you.
I could hardly contain myself for joy.
zh: 我高兴得快要按捺不住了。

en: I was beside myself with joy.
I was filled with joy.
I went out on a limb and bought 500 shares of Sony stock.
zh: 我冒了个险，买了500股索尼的股票。

en: I came near to getting involved in a crime.
zh: 我差点卷入了一场犯罪。

en: I came near to being run over by the truck.
zh: 我差点被那辆大货车撞到。

en: I was nearly run over by a truck.
I was foiled in my attempt.
I went to sleep with a handkerchief over my face.
zh: 我脸上盖着块手绢睡着了。

en: I felt a cold wind on my face.
zh: 我感觉到一阵冷风吹在脸上。

en: I am Kazuto Iwamoto.
I felt as if my face were on fire.
I had broken my glasses, so that I couldn't see the blackboard.
zh: 我把眼镜弄坏了，所以看不清黑板。

en: I can read without glasses.
I can hardly see without my glasses.
zh: 我不戴眼镜几乎啥也看不清。

en: I got my eyes tested.
I found a beautiful shell on the shore.
zh: 我在海边捡到一个漂亮的贝壳。

en: I saw Tony off at Kansai International Airport.
zh: 我在关西国际机场给托尼送行。

en: I cannot speak English without making some mistakes.
zh: 我说英语免不了会出错。

en: I took his umbrella by mistake.
I have brought his umbrella by mistake.
zh: 我不小心把他的伞带来了。

en: He did me the honor of saying that I was right.
zh: 他认可我是对的，这让我倍感荣幸。

en: I asked forgiveness for the mistake I made.
zh: 我为我犯的错请求原谅。

en: I might be wrong.
I could be wrong.
I may be wrong.
I may have made a mistake.
I've made a mistake, though I didn't intend to.
zh: 虽然我不是故意的，但我还是弄错了。

en: I do not like to make mistakes.
I don't like to make a mistake.
I don't like to make mistakes.
I have a tourist visa.
I was at the theater.
I have a history of liver trouble.
I can read Spanish easily.
I'm a nurse.
I want to be a nurse.
I was aware of being watched.
zh: 我察觉到有人在盯着我。

en: I don't like spoiled children.
zh: 我不喜欢被惯坏的孩子。

en: I allow myself no sweets.
I have a fondness for sweets.
I like sweet cakes very much.
I know a lot about environmental problems.
zh: 我对环境问题了解很多。

en: I interviewed a lady who works to protect the environment.
zh: 我采访了一位从事环保工作的女士。

en: I received a welcome.
I was welcomed.
I haven't completely given up the idea.
zh: 我还没完全打消这个念头。

en: I am very sensitive to the cold.
I am easily affected by cold weather.
zh: 我很容易受冷空气影响。

en: I am accustomed to cold weather.
I'm cold and wet.
I felt cold.
I checked my briefcase and umbrella in the cloakroom.
zh: 我把公文包和伞存在衣帽间了。

en: I slipped and fell down the stairs.
zh: 我滑了一跤，从楼梯上摔了下来。

en: I received a good job offer.
zh: 我拿到了一个挺好的工作机会。

en: I arrived outside the dressing room.
I have a fancy to live the hard way.
zh: 我想体验一下艰苦的生活。

en: I play the piano for amusement.
I had a time playing tennis.
zh: 我打网球打得挺开心的。

en: I anticipate a good vacation.
zh: 我很期待有个愉快的假期。

en: I had a good time.
I regret having been lazy in my school days.
zh: 我后悔上学那会儿太懒了。

en: I stayed up much later when I was a student.
zh: 我当学生那会儿比现在睡得晚得多。

en: I have a student visa.
I take it for granted that students come to school to study.
zh: 我认为学生来学校学习是理所当然的。

en: I don't lend my books to any of the students.
zh: 我从不把书借给任何学生。

en: I kept company with him since we were students.
zh: 从学生时代起我就一直和他在一起。

en: When I was a student, I used to go to that pizza parlor.
zh: 我当学生那会儿常去那家披萨店。

en: I am a student.
I'm a student.
I am a student, but he isn't.
I'm a student, but he isn't.
I remember my school days very well.
zh: 我对学生时代的事情记得很清楚。

en: It wasn't until I left school that I realized the importance of study.
zh: 直到离开学校，我才意识到学习的重要性。

en: I still have many clear memories of my school days.
zh: 我对学生时代还有很多清晰的回忆。

en: I'm proud of my school.
zh: 我为我的学校感到自豪。

en: I have to leave school.
I met Tony on my way school this morning.
zh: 今天早上在去学校的路上我遇到了托尼。

en: I was on my way to school.
zh: 我当时在去学校的路上。

en: I do not go to school.
I met him on my way to school.
zh: 我在去学校的路上遇到了他。

en: Living near the school, I come home for lunch.
zh: 因为住得离学校近，我回家吃午饭。

en: Because I live near the school, I come home for lunch.
zh: 因为我住得离学校近，所以我回家吃午饭。

en: I hurried in order not to be late for school.
zh: 为了上学不迟到，我一路紧赶。

en: I am proud of never being late for school.
zh: 我为自己从没上学迟到过而感到自豪。

en: I apologized for having been late for school.
zh: 我因为上学迟到道了歉。

en: I ran because I was late for school.
zh: 因为上学快迟到了，我是一路跑过去的。

en: I arrived at school on time.
I saw my uncle on the way to school.
zh: 我在上学路上碰见了我叔叔。

en: I put in an hour of jogging before I go to school.
zh: 我上学前会先慢跑一个小时。

en: I feel happiest when I am in school.
zh: 我在学校的时候最开心。

en: I feel happiest when I'm at school.
zh: 我在学校的时候感到最快乐。

en: I feel the happiest when I'm at school.
zh: 我在学校时是最开心的。

en: I was ten minutes late for school.
I study at school.
I'm studying art at school.
At school I had enjoyed reading Japanese literature in English translation, in particular Soseki's I am a Cat and Kokoro, and Akutagawa's The Nose and Kappa.
zh: 上学那会儿我挺喜欢读日本文学的英译本，尤其是夏目漱石的《我是猫》和《心》，还有芥川龙之介的《鼻》和《河童》。

en: I regret not having studied harder at school.
zh: 我很后悔上学时没再用功点。

en: I rarely saw him at school.
Apart from schoolwork, I write poetry.
zh: 除了学校的功课，我还会写诗。

en: I played tennis after school was over.
On my way home from school I met her.
zh: 放学回家的路上我碰到了她。

en: I met him on my way from school.
zh: 放学回家的路上我遇到他了。

en: We were caught in a shower on our way from school.
zh: 我们放学路上遇到了阵雨。

en: We were caught in a shower on our way home from school.
zh: 我们放学回家的路上被阵雨淋了。

en: I sometimes help my parents in the shop after school.
zh: 我放学后有时会帮父母看店。

en: I met Tony on my way home from school.
zh: 我放学回家的路上碰到了托尼。

en: I met him on my way home from school.
zh: 我放学回家的路上遇到他了。

en: I like art and music among my school subjects.
zh: 学校的科目里，我比较喜欢美术和音乐。

en: I made friends with them at the school festival.
zh: 我在学校的活动上和他们成了朋友。

en: I go to school because I want to learn.
zh: 我上学是因为我想学知识。

en: I caught a glimpse of him as he turned the corner.
zh: 他转过拐角的时候，我瞥见了他一眼。

en: I turned the corner and caught sight of a newly opened restaurant.
zh: 我转过拐角，看到了一家新开的餐厅。

en: I am going to the theater on the corner.
zh: 我要去拐角处的那家剧院。

en: I'm going to the theater on the corner.
zh: 我要去街角的那家剧院。

en: I am ready.
I did say that, but I didn't mean it.
zh: 我确实说过那话，但我不是那个意思。

en: I am willing to go on record as opposing nuclear tests.
zh: 我愿意公开表示我反对核试验。

en: I use numbered index cards for each student.
zh: 我给每个学生都准备了带编号的索引卡。

en: I can do without an overcoat.
I stayed at home instead of going out.
I must finish it before I go out.
I never go out without buying something.
zh: 我每次出门肯定都会买点东西。

en: I take an umbrella with me when I go out.
I was going out, when the telephone rang.
zh: 我正要出门，电话就响了。

en: I was getting ready to go out. At that time, the telephone rang.
zh: 我当时正准备出门，就在那时电话响了。

en: I must go out.
I was told not go out, which advice I followed.
zh: 有人劝我别出门，我就听了。

en: I don't want to go out.
I prefer to buy domestic rather than foreign products.
zh: 比起外国货，我更喜欢买国货。

en: I was taught English by a foreigner.
zh: 我的英语是一个外国人教的。

en: Being a foreigner, I couldn't catch on to the joke.
zh: 因为我是外国人，所以没听懂那个笑话。

en: I am learning two foreign languages.
I'm learning two foreign languages.
I am thinking of going abroad.
I intended to have gone abroad.
I had intended to go abroad.
I had planned to go abroad.
I am aching to go abroad.
I want to go to another country.
I prefer English cars to foreign ones.
zh: 比起别的外国车，我更喜欢英国车。

en: I came into frequent contact with foreign students.
I have many friends in foreign countries.
I wish to go abroad.
I am all alone in a foreign country.
zh: 我一个人孤零零地在异国他乡。

en: I returned from abroad.
I could not get out.
I was unable to go outside.
I addressed my full attention to the landscape outside.
zh: 我全神贯注地看着外面的景色。

en: I ran out and caught a taxi.
zh: 我跑出去打了一辆出租车。

en: I put on my cap to go out.
I met him on the stairs as I was coming up.
zh: 我上楼的时候在楼梯上碰见了他。

en: I gave an opening address.
I'm going to give Emi a new CD.
I like to draw pictures.
I want a room to paint a picture in.
zh: 我想要一间可以画画的房间。

en: I would like to draw.
I am poor at drawing.
I can't draw, but my sister is a great artist.
zh: 我不会画画，但我姐姐是个了不起的艺术家。

en: I wish to go to Paris to study art.
I showed genius in painting.
I don't know much about painting, but I can tell that this brush has an excellent stroke feel to it.
zh: 我不太懂画，但我能感觉出这支笔手感很好。

en: I spoke so loudly as to be heard by everyone.
zh: 我说话很大声，每个人都能听见。

en: I spoke in a voice loud enough to be heard by everyone.
zh: 我说话的声音大到所有人都能听到。

en: I'd like you to be more punctual.
I am proud to work with you.
zh: 能和你一起工作我很自豪。

en: I am anticipating a good vacation at the seaside.
zh: 我期待在海边过个愉快的假期。

en: I went into the navy.
While living near the beach, I often enjoyed swimming.
zh: 住在海边的时候，我经常去游泳。

en: I am working in the Overseas Operations Division.
There's nothing I can do but give up the idea of going abroad.
zh: 我只能放弃出国的念头。

en: I looked down at the sea.
I like mountains better than seas.
I like the mountains more than I like the sea.
zh: 我喜欢山胜过喜欢大海。

en: I went swimming in the sea.
I spent my vacation at the beach.
I want to bathe in the sea.
I want to live in comfort.
I found the broken doll mended by somebody.
zh: 我发现那个坏了的洋娃娃被人修好了。

en: I didn't have time to recover before I came down with another horrible cold.
zh: 我感冒还没好透，就又得了一场重感冒。

en: I must think over the matter before giving my answer.
zh: 答复之前我得仔细考虑一下。

en: I don't have a decryption program.
I'm a company man - an ordinary salaried office worker.
zh: 我是个公司职员，就是个普通的上班族。

en: I am an office worker.
I want to be at the top of the company.
zh: 我想爬到公司的最高层。

en: I traveled in the interest of my company.
I've given my best for the company.
I was asked to buy some cakes on the way home from the office.
zh: 下班回家路上有人让我顺便买点蛋糕。

en: I'll attend the meeting.
I forgot the date of the meeting.
I was late for the meeting with the result that I missed the most important part.
zh: 我开会迟到了，结果把最关键的部分给错过了。

en: I got up early in order to attend the meeting.
zh: 我为了开会特意起个大早。

en: I left home early so I'd be on time for the meeting.
zh: 我为了开会不迟到，早早就出门了。

en: I was not present at that meeting.
My proposal was turned down in the conference.
zh: 我的提议在会上被否了。

en: I ventured to say my opinion at the conference.
zh: 我在会上试着说了下我的想法。

en: I had an awful time at the conference.
zh: 那个会开得我难受极了。

en: I was absent from the meeting.
I suggest that the meeting be postponed.
I presented myself at the meeting.
I told the news to everyone I met.
zh: 我把这消息告诉了见到的每一个人。

en: I like to take my pad and pencil and drive to the seashore to sketch.
zh: 我喜欢带着画板和笔，开车去海边画画。

en: I shut the window to keep the mosquitoes out.
zh: 我关上窗户是为了挡蚊子。

en: I got bitten by mosquitoes.
I have put aside one fourth of my salary for the last three years.
zh: 过去这三年，我把工资的四分之一都存起来了。

en: I was appointed to section chief.
I was busy packing, because I was leaving for France in two days.
zh: 我正忙着打包行李，因为过两天就要去法国了。

en: I am allergic to pollen.
I'm allergic to pollen.
I have been to see the cherry blossoms.
I have been to the park to see flowers.
I have a lot of flowers. Some are red and others are yellow.
zh: 我有很多花，有些是红的，有些是黄的。

en: I'm going to exhibit my roses at the flower show.
zh: 我准备在花展上展示我种的玫瑰。

en: I need not have watered the flowers. Just after I finished it started raining.
zh: 我白浇花了，刚浇完就下雨。

en: I am watering the flowers.
I tried to set by all the money I could earn.
zh: 我想方设法把赚到的钱都存起来。

en: I will have finished reading this book by Tuesday.
zh: 我周二之前就能把这本书看完。

en: I'm studying kabuki drama.
I hope to become a singer.
zh: 我希望能成为一名歌手。

en: I want to become a singer.
I like to sing songs.
I'm good at singing.
I like to sing.
I like singing.
I feel like singing.
I found out where to buy fruit cheaply.
zh: 我打听到哪儿买水果便宜了。

en: I write poems in my free time.
I often spend my leisure time listening to the radio.
zh: 我休息的时候经常听广播。

en: I went home and Bill stayed at the office.
zh: 我回去了，比尔留在了办公室。

en: I can pay no more than $50 a week for rent.
zh: 我每周最多付50美金房租。

en: I worked hard in order to support my family.
zh: 我努力工作是为了养家糊口。

en: I like to give gifts to my family and friends.
zh: 我喜欢给家人和朋友送礼物。

en: I am the first musician in my family.
zh: 我是我们家第一个音乐家。

en: I took a picture of my family.
I am loved by all my family.
I concurred in giving up my vacation for my family.
zh: 为了家人，我同意放弃我的假期。

en: I am able to provide food and clothes for my family.
I read your letter to my family.
zh: 我把你的信读给家里人听了。

en: I feel happiest when I am at home with my family.
zh: 和家人在家的时候我最开心。

en: I went camping with my family.
I postponed doing my housework for a few hours.
zh: 我把家务活往后推了几个小时。

en: I entrusted my wife with the family finances.
zh: 我把家里的钱都交给我老婆管了。

en: I bought three pieces of furniture.
I sold the house to advantage.
zh: 我把房子卖了个好价钱。

en: I sold the house for a profit.
I'm going to sell my house.
I have abandoned the idea of buying a house.
I gave up on the idea of buying a house.
I've given up on the idea of buying a house.
zh: 我已经放弃买房的念头了。

en: I'm looking for a house.
I want to go home.
I love to fish in the trout stream behind my house.
zh: 我喜欢在我家后面的溪流里钓鳟鱼。

en: I was not going to keep up the family tradition.
zh: 我不打算延续这个家族传统。

en: I looked round the inside of the house.
I am in the house.
I'm in the house.
I felt something move in the house.
zh: 我感觉屋里有什么东西在动。

en: I was at a loss when I lost my house key.
zh: 我丢了家门钥匙，当时真不知道该怎么办了。

en: I can find a tree by the house.
zh: 我在房子旁边看到了一棵树。

en: The moment I arrived home, I went to bed.
I have my own bedroom at home.
zh: 我在家有我自己的卧室。

en: At home I have a room of my own.
zh: 在家我有属于自己的房间。

en: I got caught in a storm on my way home.
zh: 我回家的路上遇到了暴风雨。

en: I saw a white bird on my way home.
zh: 我回家的路上看到了一只白鸟。

en: I met one of my friends on my way home.
zh: 我回家的路上遇到了一个朋友。

en: I used to drop in at the bookstore on my way home.
zh: 我以前回家路上经常顺便去书店逛逛。

en: I met her on my way home.
zh: 我回家的路上碰到了她。

en: I went home.
I took a doze after coming home.
I had my house painted.
I tried hard to make them stay home, but they refused to listen to me.
zh: 我好说歹说想让他们待在家里，但他们就是不听。

en: I prefer going out to staying home.
zh: 比起宅在家里，我更喜欢出门。

en: I will stay at home.
I have to stay home.
For my part I prefer to stay at home and read a novel.
zh: 我个人更倾向于待在家里看小说。

en: I stayed at home, for it rained that day.
zh: 因为那天下了雨，我就一直待在家里。

en: I lent Mrs. Jones all the butter there was in the house.
zh: 我把家里所有的黄油都借给琼斯太太了。

en: I study English at home.
I will study English at home.
I felt the house shaking terribly.
zh: 我感觉到房子晃得很厉害。

en: I am going to Hokkaido in the summer.
I swam in the afternoons during the summer vacation.
zh: 暑假期间我每天下午都去游泳。

en: I went back to my village during the summer vacation.
zh: 暑假我回老家村子里了。

en: I will take advantage of the summer vacation to travel abroad.
zh: 我打算趁着暑假去国外旅行。

en: I am looking forward to the summer vacation.
I'm looking forward to the summer break.
I spent the summer vacation at my aunt's house.
zh: 我暑假是在我姑妈家过的。

en: I studied in the morning during the summer vacation.
zh: 暑假里我早上都会学习。

en: I never think of summer without thinking of my childhood.
zh: 一想到夏天，我就忍不住想起童年。

en: I'm staying at my aunt's for the summer.
zh: 我这个暑假住在我姑妈家。

en: I like winter better than summer.
zh: 比起夏天，我更喜欢冬天。

en: I like to suck on frozen ice cream bars in the summer.
I can't survive without air conditioning in the summer.
zh: 夏天没空调我真活不下去。

en: I can't do without an air conditioner in the summer.
I took a cottage for the summer.
I swim in the summer.
I take a bath every morning in summer.
zh: 夏天我每天早上都洗澡。

en: I take a bath every morning in the summer.
zh: 夏天我每天早上都会洗个澡。

en: I end up unconsciously trying to get fit as summer draws near.
zh: 一快到夏天，我就不知不觉地想健身。

en: I like summer the best.
I make a bargain with him over the price.
I live in comfort.
I caught sight of hundreds of birds.
I saw some poor cats kicked out.
zh: 我看到几只可怜的小猫被赶了出来。

en: I lived for years and years.
I've dealt with this store for years.
zh: 我光顾这家店好多年了。

en: I have been here for many years.
I have traveled many times.
I've traveled many times.
I have thought about ghosts many times.
zh: 我好多次都想过鬼的事。

en: I called his office again and again, but no one answered.
zh: 我一遍又一遍地往他办公室打电话，但没人接。

en: I have met him many times.
I have tried innumerable times to contact him.
I tried again and again.
I went down the slope, falling again and again.
zh: 我下坡的时候摔了好多次跤。

en: I tried many times to use a personal computer.
I tried the problem again and again.
zh: 这道题我试了一遍又一遍。

en: I heard some students complain about the homework.
zh: 我听见有些学生在抱怨作业。

en: I respected some young writers.
zh: 我很敬佩一些年轻作家。

en: I went there dozens of times.
I debated for hours with my friends on the subject.
zh: 我跟朋友为了这事儿辩论了好几个小时。

en: I waited for hours, but she didn't show up.
zh: 我等了好几个小时，但她没出现。

en: I must go some day or other.
I want to make sure what time I'm supposed to leave.
zh: 我想确定一下我该几点走。

en: I don't know what time it is.
I look to him for direction in everything.
I will do my best in everything.
I went to the library to read some books.
zh: 我去图书馆看了会儿书。

en: How old do you think I am?
I inquired about the book in many stores.
zh: 我在好几家店都问过这本书。

en: I took a casual look at the magazine.
zh: 我随便翻了翻那本杂志。

en: I don't know what to study.
What am I to do?
I must decide what to do.
I have to decide what to do.
zh: 我必须得决定该做什么。

en: I need to decide what to do.
What shall I do?
I know what to do.
Where do I come in?
I was at sea as to what to do.
zh: 我当时一片茫然，不知道该怎么办。

en: I was at a loss as to what to do.
zh: 我当时不知道该怎么办才好。

en: I don't know what to do.
Not knowing what to do, I asked him for advice.
zh: 因为不知道该怎么办，我就去请教他了。

en: What had I better do?
What should I do?
I was at a loss what to do.
As I did not know what to do, I asked him for advice.
zh: 因为不知道该怎么办，我就向他征求了建议。

en: Since I didn't know what to do, I asked him for advice.
zh: 既然不知道该怎么办，我就问了他的意见。

en: I value your friendship more than anything.
zh: 我比什么都珍惜咱们的友谊。

en: I have nothing to fall back on.
I can't bring myself to eat anything.
I don't feel like eating anything.
I said nothing, which made him angry.
zh: 我什么都没说，这让他很生气。

en: I said nothing, which made her angry.
zh: 我什么都没说，这让她很生气。

en: I said nothing, which made him more furious.
zh: 我没吭声，反而让他更火大了。

en: I said nothing, which made him all the more angry.
zh: 我一句话也没说，反而让他更生气了。

en: I couldn't think of anything to say.
I saw nothing.
I can't see anything.
I can't see anything!
I can't see a thing.
I am not frightened of anything.
I fear nothing.
I'm not frightened of anything.
I'm not scared of anything.
I can't do anything.
I spent an idle week there.
zh: 我在那儿闲了一个星期。

en: I will let myself loose.
I had to speak at a moment's notice.
I had no difficulty in finding his house.
zh: 我没费什么劲就找到了他家。

en: Since I didn't know what to say, I remained silent.
zh: 因为不知道该说什么，我就一直沉默。

en: I will give up drinking at any cost.
zh: 无论如何我也要把酒戒了。

en: I managed to get out of the scrape.
zh: 我好不容易才摆脱了那个困境。

en: I want to see her by any means.
zh: 无论如何我都想见她一面。

en: I wanted to have had everything my own way.
zh: 我本想让一切都按我的心意来。

en: I had to do everything alone.
zh: 我得独自完成所有事情。

en: I can hear something.
I hear something.
I want something to read on the train.
zh: 我想在火车上找点东西看。

en: I wanted something to eat.
I want to buy something to eat.
I feel like eating something.
I want to eat something.
I would like to eat something.
I'll stand by you no matter what happens.
zh: 不管发生什么，我都会支持你。

en: I'll remain your ally no matter what happens.
zh: 不管发生什么，我都会站在你这边。

en: I want to drink something.
I am afraid I ate something bad.
I must get the concert ticket by all means.
zh: 无论如何我也得弄到那张演唱会门票。

en: I know what's in the box.
I felt something moving on my back.
zh: 我觉得背上有东西在动。

en: I felt something touch my foot.
zh: 我感觉到有什么东西碰了下我的脚。

en: I ordered half a dozen books on chemistry from New York.
zh: 我从纽约订了半打化学书。

en: I'm not a bit interested in chemistry.
zh: 我对化学一点兴趣都没有。

en: I was on the hunt for lodgings.
I live in a rooming house.
zh: 我住在一个出租公寓里。

en: I teach Mr Lee's children English in exchange for room and board.
zh: 我教李先生的孩子英语，以换取食宿。

en: I teach Mr. Lee's children English in exchange for room and board.
zh: 我给李先生的孩子教英语，来换取管吃管住。

en: I don't want to sing, because I'm tone-deaf.
zh: 我不想唱歌，因为我五音不全。

en: I belong to the music club.
I love music, especially rock.
zh: 我很喜欢音乐，尤其是摇滚。

en: I'm studying voice at a college of music.
I like listening to music.
I like listening to music, especially jazz.
zh: 我喜欢听音乐，特别是爵士乐。

en: I often study while listening to music.
zh: 我经常边听音乐边学习。

en: I spend a lot of time listening to music.
I am listening to the music.
I'm listening to music.
I like listening to music, and playing music even more.
zh: 我喜欢听音乐，更喜欢玩音乐。

en: I like English better than music.
zh: 比起音乐，我更喜欢英语。

en: I can't run away from the fascination of music.
zh: 我无法抗拒音乐的魅力。

en: I would like to go to Austria in order to study music.
I have no ear for music.
I have given myself to music.
zh: 我全身心地投入到了音乐中。

en: I talked about music.
I am interested in music.
I'm interested in music.
I am very interested in music.
I am in the music club.
I do not like music.
I don't like music.
I like music, but I also like paintings.
zh: 我喜欢音乐，但也喜欢绘画。

en: I am fond of music.
I don't have an ear for music.
I don't understand music.
I like music very much.
I like music, particularly classical music.
zh: 我喜欢音乐，特别是古典乐。

en: I like music, especially classical music.
zh: 我喜欢音乐，尤其是古典音乐。

en: I keep a daily record of the temperature.
I grow orchids in my greenhouse.
I was ashamed of what I had done to my benefactor.
zh: 我对自己对恩人所做的事感到羞愧。

en: I got this job with my teacher's help.
zh: 在老师的帮助下，我得到了这份工作。

en: I painted the roof light blue.
zh: 我把屋顶漆成了浅蓝色。

en: I love the sound of rain on the roof.
zh: 我喜欢雨水打在屋顶上的声音。

en: I like the warm sea around Okinawa.
zh: 我喜欢冲绳那片温暖的海。

en: I met the prince himself.
I live in Yokohama.
I was born in Yokohama.
I was raised in Yokohama.
I walked straight ahead without looking to the side.
zh: 我一直往前走，看都不看两边。

en: I was afraid of being put into a closet.
I was crowded out.
I waited for the answer but nobody answered.
zh: 我等了半天回音，但没人理我。

en: I was ushered into the drawing room.
I picked up a purse in the street.
I got a letter written with a pencil.
zh: 我收到一封用铅笔写的信。

en: I have not any pencils.
I don't have a pencil.
I don't have any pencils.
I lent my pencil to him.
I want a knife to sharpen my pencil with.
I bought two dozen pencils.
I bought ten pencils, half of which were to be given to my brother.
zh: 我买了十支铅笔，其中一半是要给我弟弟的。

en: I caught sight of her figure in the distance.
zh: 我看到了远处她的身影。

en: I saw flashes of lightning in the distance.
I have to commute all the way from a distant suburb.
zh: 我得大老远从郊区赶过来上班。

en: I am forbidden tobacco.
I could not refrain from smoking.
I can't give up smoking.
I stopped smoking and drinking.
I quit smoking and drinking.
I have quit smoking and drinking.
I was unable to breathe because of the smoke.
I was choked by smoke.
I never make a speech without being nervous.
I made a draft of my speech.
I belong to the drama club.
I played an important part in the garden party.
zh: 我在游园会里负责很重要的部分。

en: I got off at the wrong station.
It took me ten minutes to walk to the station.
zh: 走去车站花了我十分钟。

en: I walked as far as the station.
I took a cab to the station.
We had to walk all the way to the station.
zh: 我们不得不一路走到车站。

en: I ran all the way to the station.
I met my teacher on the way to the station.
zh: 我在去车站的路上碰到了老师。

en: I hurried to the station only to miss the train.
zh: 我匆匆赶到车站，结果还是没赶上火车。

en: I went to the station.
I'm just about to set off for the station.
I am near the station.
I met her in a coffee shop near the station.
zh: 我在车站附近的咖啡馆见了她。

en: I met an old man near the station.
zh: 我在车站附近遇到了一个老人。

en: I will pick him up at the station.
I arrived at the station.
I bumped into him at the station.
I joined him at the station.
